headline: Edison International Declares Q2 Dividend
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., June 25, 2025--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8275 per share, payable on July 31, 2025, to shareholders of record on July 7, 2025.
